name: Hamster Squad
description:
In Hamster Squad you can chat with your friends, or paint them all! Explore a small town of hamsters, roleplay and make funny faces in this sandbox hamster filled world!

You can also shoot your friends and paint the world with paintballs! If you shoot an NPC they will run away from you! Woah!

This game may receive updates in the future with much more features, at your request, so don't be shy and comment your ideas!
